caption:
The story of a fan who became the club’s most successful president 🌟🔥
⠀
In 2012, Tiago Rech — then a young journalist — went viral for being the only supporter in the stands during a Santa Cruz home match against Gremio. His beloved team lost 1-4, and cameras caught him passionately cheering alone in a sea of empty seats. 😬❤️
⠀
But that was just the beginning of an incredible journey.
⠀
Tiago later joined Santa Cruz’s media team and worked his way up through the ranks. In 2018, he became club president. 🤩
⠀
Under his leadership, Santa Cruz made history:
🏆 Won the State Championship
🇧🇷 Qualified for the Copa do Brasil for the first time in their 107-year history
💰 Paid off debts and stabilized the club financially
⠀
From lone fan to historic president — a true story of passion, persistence, and love for the badge.
